axis0.name: <%= ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AUFK"."BUKRS_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."BUKRS"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AFPO"."DWERK_TEXT"'?'#{"AFPO"."DWERK"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AUFK"."GSBER_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."GSBER"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."PRCTR"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AFPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'?'#{"material"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AFPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'?'#{"materialGroup"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"CRHD"."MATYP"'?'#{"CRHD"."MATYP"}': ''%>
axis0.translatedName: <%= ButtonDrilldown4== '"AUFK"."BUKRS_TEXT"'  ? 'Company Code': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AFPO"."DWERK_TEXT"'  ? 'Plant' : ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AUFK"."GSBER_TEXT"'  ? 'Business Area': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT"'  ? 'Profit Center': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AFPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'  ? 'Material': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AFPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'  ? 'Material group':''%>

components.title: #{automationRate} #{by} <%= ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AUFK"."BUKRS_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."BUKRS"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AFPO"."DWERK_TEXT"'?'#{"AFPO"."DWERK"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AUFK"."GSBER_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."GSBER"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."PRCTR"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AFPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'?'#{"material"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AFPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'?'#{"materialGroup"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"CRHD"."MATYP"'?'#{"CRHD"."MATYP"}': ''%>

components.buttonTitle: <%= ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AUFK"."BUKRS_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."BUKRS"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AFPO"."DWERK_TEXT"'?'#{"AFPO"."DWERK"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AUFK"."GSBER_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."GSBER"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."PRCTR"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AFPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'?'#{"material"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"AFPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'?'#{"materialGroup"}': ButtonDrilldown4 == '"CRHD"."MATYP"'?'#{"CRHD"."MATYP"}': ''%>

variables.name: differencePlannedActualFinish
variables.value:
REMAP_TIMESTAMPS(PU_LAST("AFPO", "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%=language%>" = 'Scheduled finish time'),DAYS)-
REMAP_TIMESTAMPS(PU_LAST("AFPO", "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%=language%>" = 'Actual finish time'),DAYS)

formula.text:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT")=1 THEN "AUFK"."PRCTR" 
ELSE "AUFK"."PRCTR" || ' - ' || "AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT" 
END

formula.text:
CASE 
    WHEN ISNULL("AFPO"."XLOEK") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "AFPO"."XLOEK" = 'X' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "AFPO"."XLOEK"
END
